General.PleaseSelectLocationError: Please select location from the dropdown.
General.RecipientCountError: The recipient list for this campaign exceeds 30,000 recipients. Please adjust the filters or custom uploaded list in order to reduce the recipient list to less than 30,000. If you experience any further issues, please reach out to your support team.
General.FailedToFetchDefaultAccentColors: Failed to fetch default accent colors.

ErrorCodesMessages.WebsiteVariablesMissing: This campaign contains images and URLs that are currently not configured. Contact Support to complete your account configuration before enabling this campaign.

InProgressTableRow.CampaignSendingInProgressError: This campaign is already in progress and cannot be edited or deleted.

InProgressTableRow.ConfirmCopy: Are you sure you want to duplicate this campaign?

SentCampaignsTable.MinDateMessage: Date should not be before start date
SentCampaignsTable.MaxDateMessage: Date should not be after end date

SentEmailBlastTableRow.ConfirmCopy: Are you sure you want to duplicate this campaign?
SentEmailBlastTableRow.WarningCopy: Copying a campaign copies the selected recipient filters, email template, and email content. Additional edits can be made to the email before sending.

CreateAnEmailBlastSelectCategory.Heading: Create an Email Blast
CreateAnEmailBlastSelectCategory.HolidaysSubText: Special occasions, usually occurring once per calendar year
CreateAnEmailBlastSelectCategory.EventsSubText: Special causes/charities; such as Brakes for Breasts, tax refunds

CreateAnEmailBlastDesignEdit.Heading: Create an Email Blast
CreateAnEmailBlastDesignEdit.GoBackText: If you go back to template selection, your changes will be lost. Are you sure?

ScheduleCampaign.Heading: Schedule and Send
ScheduleCampaign.SendASAPText: Email will send within the next 10 minutes
ScheduleCampaign.SendLaterText: Email will send at the selected day and time
ScheduleCampaign.PastSendDateError: Scheduled Date and Time must be in the future

ToSection.Title: To
ToSection.Subtitle: Who are you sending this email blast to?
ToSection.UploadCustomerListHelperText: Select a CSV file with columns for Name and Email. While Name and Email columns are required, the Name field can be left blank for each recipient. All characters in the Name column will appear as the Name in the email, up to 256 characters. An optional third column for Vehicle can be added if you want to use a specific Vehicle keyword for each customer in the email.
ToSection.CSVErrorOccurred: An error occurred. Please try again.

FromSection.Title: From
FromSection.Subtitle: Who is sending this email blast?
FromSection.Name: Name
FromSection.NameHelperText: Use something customers will instantly recognize, like your company name.

SubjectSection.Subject: Subject
SubjectSection.Subtitle: What’s the subject line for this email blast?
SubjectSection.SubjectHelperText: A great subject line gives your customers a reason to open your email.
SubjectSection.PreviewTextHelperText: Preview text appears in the inbox after the subject line.
SubjectSection.PreviewTextTooltipExplanation: The preview text is a short message that displays after the subject line in your email. It's that teaser that gives more info about the email.

EditRecipientFilters.PopupSubtitle: Use the filters below to create a custom list of recipients.

TimeSinceLastVisitFilter.TimeSinceLastVisitSubtitle: Include customers based on the date of their last visit.
TimeSinceLastVisitFilter.TimeSinceLastVisitInfo: This blast will be sent to customers that have last visited between {{endMonths}} and {{startMonths}} months ago.

ReviewRecipients.Title: Review Recipients
ReviewRecipients.SearchByNameOrEmail: Search by name or email address
ReviewRecipients.VehicleTooltip: The value in this column will be used if the Vehicle Keyword is added to the email body. If no Vehicle is provided, the word "vehicle" will be used in the email.

TotalAmountSpent.Title: Total Amount Spent
TotalAmountSpent.OnlyIncludeCustomers: Only include customers that have spent between:
TotalAmountSpent.MinValueMoreThanMaxError: Minimum amount must be less than Maximum amount spent.

CustomerVehicleMake.Title: Customer Vehicle Make
CustomerVehicleMake.DuplicatedMake: This Make was already added as a filter.
CustomerVehicleMake.Tooltip: Multiple vehicle makes can be added but each must be entered one at a time.

NumberOfVisitsFilter.CustomersWhoVisitedTheShopBetween: Customers who visited the shop between:
NumberOfVisitsFilter.TimesWithinFilteredDateRange: times within the filtered date range.
NumberOfVisitsFilter.MinNumberOfVisitsMustBeLessThanMax: Minimum number of visits must be less than Maximum number of visits.

EditContentSection.Title: Edit Content
EditContentSection.Subtitle: Design the content for the email blast
EditContentSection.AccentColorsSubText: Customize your template with accent colors.
EditContentSection.ImagesSubText: Add additional images to your email.
EditContentSection.TextSubText: Need inspiration? Browse our sample messages.
EditContentSection.SpecialOffersSubText: A special offer will motivate your customers to take action. Add a special offer from your existing specials or create a new one.
EditContentSection.ButtonsSubText: Add a call-to-action with an eye-catching button that links to a social media page or your appointment page.

PreviousEmailCampaignsFilter.Title: Previous Email Campaigns
PreviousEmailCampaignsFilter.Subtitle: Only include customers that have not opened the previous email campaign:

FileUploader.ValidationError: Uploaded file must be .jpg, .jpeg or .png and less than 10MB
FileUploader.ImageUploadFailed: Failed to upload image, please try again later.

AddNewSpecial.CreateNewSpecialSubtitle: Creating a new special will add it to your specials tab
AddNewSpecial.CancelDialogText: Are you sure? You will lose all your changes

NewSpecialPreview.WarningMessage: Please review your special carefully. Once the special is confirmed, it can only be edited in the Specials tab.

SaveButtonsContainer.CampaignAlreadySentError: Failed to save campaign, it is already being sent out.
SaveButtonsContainer.CampaignSendingInProgressError: This campaign is already in progress and cannot be edited or deleted.
SaveButtonsContainer.FailedToVerifyCampaign: Failed to verify campaign status, please try again later.

SharePreview.PreviewSuccessfullySent: A preview has been successfully sent.
